Movies.Title: Once Upon A Time In Hollywood
Movies.Plot: A faded television actor and his stunt double strive to achieve fame and success in the film industry during the final years of Hollywood's Golden Age in 1969 Los Angeles.

Quotes.Speaker: Rick Dalton
Quotes.Quote: Well, the fucking hippies aren't.

Quotes.Speaker: Rick Dalton
Quotes.Quote: Actors are required to do a lot of dangerous stuff. Cliff here is meant to help carry the load.

Quotes.Speaker: Rick Dalton
Quotes.Quote: Anybody order fried sauerkraut?!

Quotes.Speaker: Rick Dalton
Quotes.Quote: Hey, you could do anything you want to him. Throw him off a building, right? Light him on fire. Hit him with a Lincoln! Right? Get creative!

Quotes.Speaker: Rick Dalton
Quotes.Quote: It's official old buddy, I'm a has been.

Quotes.Speaker: Rick Dalton
Quotes.Quote: Here I am, flat on my ass, and who do I got living next door to me?

Quotes.Speaker: Rick Dalton
Quotes.Quote: In this town, it can all change like that.

Quotes.Speaker: Rick Dalton
Quotes.Quote: Can we just cut? Can we just cut?

Quotes.Speaker: Bruce Lee
Quotes.Quote: My hands are registered as lethal weapons. We get into a fight, I accidentally kill you... I go to jail.

Quotes.Speaker: Bruce Lee
Quotes.Quote: You know, you're kind of pretty for a stuntman.

Quotes.Speaker: Cliff Booth
Quotes.Quote: Anybody accidentally kills anybody in a fight, they go to jail. It's called manslaughter.

Quotes.Speaker: Cliff Booth
Quotes.Quote: You are real, right?

Quotes.Speaker: Cliff Booth
Quotes.Quote: If something were to happen to my boss's car, well, I'd get in trouble. Lucky for you, he's got a spare. Fix it.

Quotes.Speaker: Cliff Booth
Quotes.Quote: Hey! You're Rick fucking Dalton, don't you forget it.

Quotes.Speaker: Cliff Booth
Quotes.Quote: Anybody accidentally kills anybody in a fight, they go to jail. It's called manslaughter.

Movies.Title: The Hateful Eight
Movies.Plot: Some time after the Civil War, a stagecoach hurtles through the wintry Wyoming landscape. Bounty hunter John Ruth and his fugitive captive Daisy Domergue race towards the town of Red Rock, where Ruth will bring Daisy to justice. Along the road, they encounter Major Marquis Warren (an infamous bounty hunter) and Chris Mannix (a man who claims to be Red Rock's new sheriff). Lost in a blizzard, the bunch seeks refuge at Minnie's Haberdashery. When they arrive they are greeted by unfamiliar faces: Bob, who claims to be taking care of the place while Minnie is gone; Oswaldo Mobray, the hangman of Red Rock; Joe Gage, a cow puncher; and confederate general Sanford Smithers. As the storm overtakes the mountainside, the eight travelers come to learn that they might not make it to Red Rock after all...

Quotes.Speaker: Marquis Warren
Quotes.Quote: You believe in Jesus now, huh bitch? Well good. 'Cause you 'bout to meet him.

Quotes.Speaker: Marquis Warren
Quotes.Quote: Y'all keep your mouth shut and do what I tell ya'. Anybody opens their mouth, gonna get a bullet. Anybody moves a little weird....little sudden--gonna get a bullet. Not a warning. Not a question; a bullet. Let me hear you say, 'I got it'.

Quotes.Speaker: Marquis Warren
Quotes.Quote: You're gonna make a deal.....with this diabolical bitch?!

Quotes.Speaker: Marquis Warren
Quotes.Quote: Well, you better shit another pistol out your ass! 'Cause if you don't throw one out here in the next two seconds; we gon' kill this bitch!

Quotes.Speaker: Marquis Warren
Quotes.Quote: How d'you like THAT, you bushwackin' castrator!?

Quotes.Speaker: Marquis Warren
Quotes.Quote: Well, shit. Now that I blowed his face off... Marco ain't worth a pesso!

Quotes.Speaker: Marquis Warren
Quotes.Quote: Got room...for one more?

Quotes.Speaker: John Ruth
Quotes.Quote: Keeping you at a disadvantage is an advantage I intend to keep.

Quotes.Speaker: John Ruth
Quotes.Quote: Yeah, Warren, that's the problem with old men. You can kick 'em down the stairs, and say it's an accident, but you can't just shoot 'em.

Quotes.Speaker: John Ruth
Quotes.Quote: Yeah. You come back with anything else but a guitar, my pistol plays a tune; Domergue's Death March. You got it?

Quotes.Speaker: John Ruth
Quotes.Quote: You only need to hang mean bastards, but Mean Bastards, you-need-to-hang!

Quotes.Speaker: John Ruth
Quotes.Quote: Now Daisy, I want us to work out a... signal system of communication. When I elbow you real hard in the face; that means SHUT UP!

Quotes.Speaker: John Ruth
Quotes.Quote: Our best bet is this duplicitous fella ain't as cool a customer as Daisy here. He won't have the leather patience it takes to just sit here and wait. If he can't handle it, he'll stop waiting. He'll try and create his opportunity.. And that's when Mr.Jumpy reveals hisself!

Quotes.Speaker: John Ruth
Quotes.Quote: This here is Daisy Domergue. She's wanted dead or alive for murder, so when that sun comes out, I'm taking this woman to hell!

Quotes.Speaker: Chris Mannix
Quotes.Quote: Like I said, friend, you got me at a bit of a disadvantage!

Quotes.Speaker: Chris Mannix
Quotes.Quote: Well, ain't love grand? Y'all wanna lie on the ground and make snow angels together?

Quotes.Speaker: Chris Mannix
Quotes.Quote: Well cut my legs off and call me Shorty!

Quotes.Speaker: Chris Mannix
Quotes.Quote: Y'all having a bounty hunter picnic?

Quotes.Speaker: Daisy Domergue
Quotes.Quote: When you get to hell, tell them Daisy sent you.

Quotes.Speaker: Daisy Domergue
Quotes.Quote: What do I got to say? About John Ruth's ravings? He's ABSOLUTELY right! Me and one of them fellas is in cahoots! And we're just waitin' for everybody to go to sleep; that's when we gonna kill y'all.

Quotes.Speaker: O.B. Jackson
Quotes.Quote: Jesus Christ! That door's a whore!

Quotes.Speaker: Oswaldo Mobray
Quotes.Quote: Kick it in! Kick it in!

Quotes.Speaker: Oswaldo Mobray
Quotes.Quote: If you're found guilty, the poeple of Red Rock will hang you in the Town Square. And as the Hang Man, I will perform the execution. And, if all those things end up taking place, that's what civilized society calls 'Justice'. , However, if the relatives, and the loved ones of the person you murdered were outside that door right now, and after BUSTING down that door....they drag you out into the snow and hang you up by the neck, that would be Frontier Justice. To me it doesn't matter what you did. When I hang you I'll get no satisfaction from your death. It's my job. I hang you in Red Rock, I move on to the next town..I hang someone else there.

Movies.Title: Django Unchained
Movies.Plot: A German dentist buys the freedom of a slave and trains him with the intent to make him his deputy bounty hunter. Instead, he is led to the site of the slave's wife who belongs to a ruthless plantation owner.

Quotes.Speaker: Django
Quotes.Quote: D'Artagnan, motherfuckers!

Quotes.Speaker: Django
Quotes.Quote: I like the way you die boy.

Quotes.Speaker: Django
Quotes.Quote: Kill white people and get paid for it? What's not to like?

Quotes.Speaker: Django
Quotes.Quote: Not while I have my freedom. Not while I have my gun.

Quotes.Speaker: Django
Quotes.Quote: I'm positive he dead.

Quotes.Speaker: Django
Quotes.Quote: Django. The D Is Silent.

Quotes.Speaker: Django
Quotes.Quote: You got yourself a deal mate!

Quotes.Speaker: Django
Quotes.Quote: Now, all you black folks, I suggest you get away from all these white folks! Not you, Stephen. You're right where you belong.

Quotes.Speaker: Django
Quotes.Quote: The D is silent, hillbilly.

Quotes.Speaker: Django
Quotes.Quote: I'm curious what makes you so curious.

Quotes.Speaker: Django
Quotes.Quote: You gonna have to keep up, ya know?

Quotes.Speaker: Django
Quotes.Quote: Goodbye, Miss Laura!

Quotes.Speaker: Django
Quotes.Quote: Django. D-J-A-N-G-O. The D's silent.

Quotes.Speaker: Django
Quotes.Quote: I count two guns, nigga.

Quotes.Speaker: Django
Quotes.Quote: Hey lil' trouble maker.

Quotes.Speaker: Django
Quotes.Quote: You said to get dirty, I'm getting dirty.

Quotes.Speaker: Calvin Candie
Quotes.Quote: Sold! To the man with the exceptional beard and his unexceptional nigga!

Quotes.Speaker: Calvin Candie
Quotes.Quote: Where is my beautiful sister?

Quotes.Speaker: Calvin Candie
Quotes.Quote: Broomhilda is my property. And I can choose to do with my property, whatever I so desire.

Quotes.Speaker: Calvin Candie
Quotes.Quote: Gentlemen, you had my curiosity, but now you have my attention.

Quotes.Speaker: Calvin Candie
Quotes.Quote: Hey! You lay your palms flat on that tabletop! If you lift those palms off of that turtleshell tabletop, Mr. Pooch is gonna let loose through both ends of that sawed-off! There have been a lot of lies said around this dinner table here tonight, but that you can believe!

Quotes.Speaker: Calvin Candie
Quotes.Quote: I've heard tell about you. I heard you been telling everybody them mandingos ain't no damn good, ain't nothing nobody is selling is worth buying - I'm curious. What makes you such a mandingo expert?

Quotes.Speaker: Calvin Candie
Quotes.Quote: You sir are a sore loser.

Quotes.Speaker: Calvin Candie
Quotes.Quote: I've been surrounded my entire life by black faces. I only have one question: Why don't they just rise up and kill the whites?

Quotes.Speaker: Calvin Candie
Quotes.Quote: Oh we weren't talking business yet, we were discussing my curiosity.

Quotes.Speaker: Dr. King Schultz
Quotes.Quote: Hello, you poor devils!

Quotes.Speaker: Dr. King Schultz
Quotes.Quote: I can see all the passions you inspire are completely justified.

Quotes.Speaker: Dr. King Schultz
Quotes.Quote: Actually, I was thinking of that poor devil you fed to the dogs today, D'Artagnan. And I was wondering what Dumas would make of all this.

Quotes.Speaker: Dr. King Schultz
Quotes.Quote: Alexandre Dumas is black.

Quotes.Speaker: Dr. King Schultz
Quotes.Quote: Everybody calm down. I'm simply a customer trying to conduct a transaction.

Quotes.Speaker: Dr. King Schultz
Quotes.Quote: My dear sir, I am simply trying to ascertain...

Quotes.Speaker: Dr. King Schultz
Quotes.Quote: Our mutual friend has a flair for the dramatic.

Quotes.Speaker: Dr. King Schultz
Quotes.Quote: You silver tongued devil, you.

Quotes.Speaker: Dr. King Schultz
Quotes.Quote: Sorry, I couldn't resist.

Quotes.Speaker: Dr. King Schultz
Quotes.Quote: Good, cold evening gentlemen.

Quotes.Speaker: Dr. King Schultz
Quotes.Quote: I'm Dr. King Schultz, and this is my horse, Fritz.

Quotes.Speaker: Dr. King Schultz
Quotes.Quote: Calm yourselves gentlemen, I mean you no harm. I'm simply a fellow weary traveler.

Quotes.Speaker: Dr. King Schultz
Quotes.Quote: Normally, Monsieur Candie, I would say "Auf Wiedersehen." But since what "Auf Wiedersehen" actually means is "'until I see you again" and since I never wish to see you again, to you sir, I say goodbye.

Quotes.Speaker: Dr. King Schultz
Quotes.Quote: [in disbelief] Let me get this straight: Your slave wife speaks German and her name is Broomhilda von Shaft?

Quotes.Speaker: Dr. King Schultz
Quotes.Quote: Alexander Dumas. He wrote "The Three Musketeers." I figured you must be an admirer. You named your slave after his novel's lead character. If Alexander Dumas had been there today, I wonder what he would have made of it?

Quotes.Speaker: Dr. King Schultz
Quotes.Quote: My name is Dr. King Schultz, and like yourself, Marshall, I am a servant of the court. The man lying dead in the dirt, who the good people of Daughtrey saw fit to elect as their sheriff, who went by the name of Bill Sharp, is actually a wanted outlaw by the name of Willard Peck, with a price on his head of 200 dollars. Now, that's 200 dollars, dead or alive.

Quotes.Speaker: Dr. King Schultz
Quotes.Quote: I'm aware this is probably disconcerting news. But I'm willing to wager this man was elected sheriff sometime in the last 2 years. I know this because 3 years ago, he was rustling cattle from the B.C. Corrigan Cattle Company of Lubbock, Texas. Now this is a warrant, made out by circuit court Judge Henry Allen Laudermilk of Austin Texas. You're encouraged to wire him. He'll back up who I am, and who your dear departed sheriff was. In other words Marshall, you owe me 200 dollars.

Quotes.Speaker: Dr. King Schultz
Quotes.Quote: Now you can get the Marshall...

Quotes.Speaker: Dr. King Schultz
Quotes.Quote: Inn keeper! Remember, get the sheriff, not the Marshall.

Quotes.Speaker: Dr. King Schultz
Quotes.Quote: Now as to you poor devils…So as I see it, when it comes to the subject of what to do next, you gentlemen have two choices. One: once I'm gone, you could lift that beast off the remaining Speck, then carry him to the nearest town. Which would be at least 37 miles back the way you came. Or Two: You could unshackle yourselves… take that rifle, put a bullet in his head, bury the two of them deep, and then make your way to a more enlightened area of this country. The choice is yours. Oh, and on the off chance there are any astronomy aficionados amongst you, the North Star is that one. Tata.

Quotes.Speaker: Dr. King Schultz
Quotes.Quote: It's a German story. There's always a mountain.

Quotes.Speaker: Dr. King Schultz
Quotes.Quote: Inn keeper! Remember, get the sheriff, not the Marshall.

Movies.Title: Inglourious Basterds
Movies.Actors: Brad Pitt, Mélanie Laurent, Christoph Waltz, Eli Roth
Movies.Plot: In German-occupied France, young Jewish refugee Shosanna Dreyfus witnesses the slaughter of her family by Colonel Hans Landa. Narrowly escaping with her life, she plots her revenge several years later when German war hero Fredrick Zoller takes a rapid interest in her and arranges an illustrious movie premiere at the theater she now runs. With the promise of every major Nazi officer in attendance, the event catches the attention of the "Basterds", a group of Jewish-American guerrilla soldiers led by the ruthless Lt. Aldo Raine. As the relentless executioners advance and the conspiring young girl's plans are set in motion, their paths will cross for a fateful evening that will shake the very annals of history.

Quotes.Speaker: Lt. Aldo Raine
Quotes.Quote: My name is Lt. Aldo Raine and I'm putting together a special team, and I need me eight soldiers. Eight Jewish-American soldiers.

Quotes.Speaker: Lt. Aldo Raine
Quotes.Quote: We're gonna be dropped into France, dressed as civilians. And once we're in enemy territory, as a bushwhackin' guerrilla army, we're gonna be doin' one thing and one thing only... killin' Nazis.

Quotes.Speaker: Lt. Aldo Raine
Quotes.Quote: Now, I don't know about y'all, but I sure as hell didn't come down from the goddamn Smoky Mountains, cross five thousand miles of water, fight my way through half of Sicily and jump out of a fuckin' air-o-plane to teach the Nazis lessons in humanity. Nazi ain't got no humanity. They're the foot soldiers of a Jew-hatin', mass murderin' maniac and they need to be dee-stroyed. That's why any and every son of a bitch we find wearin' a Nazi uniform, they're gonna die.

Quotes.Speaker: Lt. Aldo Raine
Quotes.Quote: We will be cruel to the Germans, and through our cruelty they will know who we are. And they will find the evidence of our cruelty in the disemboweled, dismembered, and disfigured bodies of their brothers we leave behind us. And the German won't not be able to help themselves but to imagine the cruelty their brothers endured at our hands, and our boot heels, and the edge of our knives. And the German will be sickened by us, and the German will talk about us, and the German will fear us. And when the German closes their eyes at night and they're tortured by their subconscious for the evil they have done, it will be with thoughts of us they are tortured with. Sound good?

Quotes.Speaker: Lt. Aldo Raine
Quotes.Quote: But I got a word of warning for all you would-be warriors. When you join my command, you take on debit. A debit you owe me personally. Each and every man under my command owes me one hundred Nazi scalps. And I want my scalps. And all y'all will git me one hundred Nazi scalps, taken from the heads of one hundred dead Nazis. Or you will die tryin'.

Quotes.Speaker: Lt. Aldo Raine
Quotes.Quote: You know, fightin' in a basement offers a lot of difficulties. Number one being, you're fightin' in a basement!

Quotes.Speaker: Lt. Aldo Raine
Quotes.Quote: Now, take your wiener schnitzel lickin' finger and point out on this map what I want to know.

Quotes.Speaker: Lt. Aldo Raine
Quotes.Quote: Actually, Werner, we're all tickled to hear you say that. Quite frankly, watchin' Donny beat Nazis to death is the closest we ever get to goin' to the movies. Donny!

Quotes.Speaker: Lt. Aldo Raine
Quotes.Quote: We got a German here who wants to die for his country! Oblige him!

Quotes.Speaker: Lt. Aldo Raine
Quotes.Quote: You probably heard we ain't in the prisoner-takin' business; we in the killin' Nazi business. And cousin, business is a-boomin'.

Quotes.Speaker: Lt. Aldo Raine
Quotes.Quote: You know how you get to Carnegie Hall, don't ya? Practice.

Quotes.Speaker: Lt. Aldo Raine
Quotes.Quote: ... I think you show great talent. And I pride myself on having an eye for that kind of talent. But your status as a Nazi killer is still amateur. We all come here to see if you wanna go pro.

Quotes.Speaker: Lt. Aldo Raine
Quotes.Quote: Well, you don't got to be Stonewall Jackson to know you don't want to fight in a basement!

Quotes.Speaker: Lt. Aldo Raine
Quotes.Quote: You see, we like our Nazis in uniform. That way we can spot 'em just like that. But you take off that uniform, ain't no one ever gonna know you were a Nazi. And that don't sit well with us. So, I'm gonna give you a little something you can't take off.

Quotes.Speaker: Lt. Archie Hicox
Quotes.Quote: Well, if this is it, old boy, I hope you don't mind if I go out speaking the King's.

Quotes.Speaker: Lt. Archie Hicox
Quotes.Quote: There's a special rung in hell reserved for people who waste good scotch. Seeing as how I may be rapping on the door momentarily…

Quotes.Speaker: Sgt. Hugo Stiglitz
Quotes.Quote: Say "Auf Wiedersehen" to your Nazi balls!

Quotes.Speaker: Col. Hans Landa
Quotes.Quote: Oooh, that's a bingo!

Quotes.Speaker: Col. Hans Landa
Quotes.Quote: The feature that makes me such an effective hunter of the Jews is, as opposed to most German soldiers, I can think like a Jew, where they can only think like a German... more precisely, German soldier. Now, if one were to determine what attribute the German people share with a beast, it would be the cunning and the predatory instinct of a hawk. But if one were to determine what attributes the Jews share with a beast, it would be that of the rat. The Führer and Goebbels's propaganda have said pretty much the same thing, but where our conclusions differ is I don't consider the comparison an insult.

Quotes.Speaker: Col. Hans Landa
Quotes.Quote: Consequently, a German soldier conducts a search of a house suspected of hiding Jews. Where does the hawk look? He looks in the barn, he looks in the attic, he looks in the cellar, he looks everywhere he would hide. But there's so many places it would never occur to a hawk to hide. However, the reason the Führer has brought me off my Alps in Austria and placed me in French cow country today is because it does occur to me. Because I'm aware what tremendous feats human beings are capable of once they abandon dignity.

Quotes.Speaker: Col. Hans Landa
Quotes.Quote: AU REVOIR, SHOSANNA!

Quotes.Speaker: Col. Hans Landa
Quotes.Quote: Sitting in your chair, I would probably say the same thing. And 999 point 999 times out of a million, you would be correct. But in the pages of history, every once in a while, fate reaches out and extends its hand.

Quotes.Speaker: Col. Hans Landa
Quotes.Quote: What shall the history books read?

Quotes.Speaker: Col. Hans Landa
Quotes.Quote: So, gentlemen, let's discuss the prospect of ending the war tonight.

Quotes.Speaker: Col. Hans Landa
Quotes.Quote: Gentlemen, I have no intention of killing Hitler and killing Goebbels and killing Göring and killing Bormann, not to mention winning the war single-handedly for the Allies, only later to find myself standing before a Jewish tribunal. If you want to win the war, tonight; we have to make a deal.

Quotes.Speaker: Col. Hans Landa
Quotes.Quote: What's that American expression? "If the shoe fits, you must wear it."

Quotes.Speaker: Sgt. Donny Donowitz
Quotes.Quote: Teddy fuckin' Williams knocks it out of the park! Fenway Park on its feet for Teddy fuckin' Ballgame! He went yardo on that one, out to fuckin' Lansdowne Street!

Quotes.Speaker: Sgt. Donny Donowitz
Quotes.Quote: Fuck a duck!

Quotes.Speaker: Adolf Hitler
Quotes.Quote: NEIN, NEIN, NEIN, NEIN, NEIN, NEIN!

Movies.Title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
Movies.Actors: Uma Thurman, Vivica A. Fox, Ambrosia Kelley, Michael Parks, James Parks
Movies.Plot: The murderous Bride is back and she is still continuing her vengeance quest against her ex-boss, Bill, and taking aim at Bill's younger brother Budd and Elle Driver, the only survivors from the squad of assassins who betrayed her four years earlier. It's all leading up to the ultimate confrontation with Bill, the Bride's former master and the man who ordered her execution!

Quotes.Speaker: The Bride
Quotes.Quote: Bitch. You don't have a future.

Quotes.Speaker: The Bride
Quotes.Quote: My pussy wagon died on me.

Quotes.Speaker: The Bride
Quotes.Quote: I will kill Bill!

Quotes.Speaker: The Bride
Quotes.Quote: You promised you'd be nice.

Quotes.Speaker: The Bride
Quotes.Quote: You and I have unfinished business.

Quotes.Speaker: The Bride
Quotes.Quote: Well, guess what, bitch? I'm better than Annie Oakley and I've got you right in my sights, so let's talk.

Quotes.Speaker: Bill
Quotes.Quote: Clark Kent is Superman's critique on the whole human race.

Quotes.Speaker: Bill
Quotes.Quote: No I'm not saying that you're a superhero but I'm saying that you're a killer, a natural born killer.

Quotes.Speaker: Bill
Quotes.Quote: No, I said I'd do my best. That's hardly a promise.

Quotes.Speaker: Bill
Quotes.Quote: I'm really sorry, Kiddo. But you thought wrong.

Quotes.Speaker: Bill
Quotes.Quote: There are consequences to breaking the heart of a murdering bastard.

Quotes.Speaker: Bill
Quotes.Quote: I suppose the traditional way to conclude this is, we cross Hanzo swords. Well, it just so happens, this hacienda comes with its very own private beach. And this private beach just so happens to look particularly beautiful bathed in moonlight. And there just so happens to be a full moon out tonight. So, swordfighter, if you want to sword fight, that's where I suggest. But if you wanna be old school about it - and you know I'm all about old school - then we can wait till dawn, and slice each other up at sunrise, like a couple real-life, honest-to-goodness samurais.

Quotes.Speaker: Bill
Quotes.Quote: I'm the man.

Quotes.Speaker: Elle Driver
Quotes.Quote: You know what I did? I killed that miserable old fool. I poisoned his fishheads. And I told him, "To me the word of an old fool like you is worth less than nothing." That's right, I killed your master. And now I'm going to kill you, with your own sword, no less, which, in the very immediate future, will become my sword.

Quotes.Speaker: Elle Driver
Quotes.Quote: Gargantuan. Such a great word. I rarely get to use it in a sentence.

Quotes.Speaker: Elle Driver
Quotes.Quote: Now in these last agonizing minutes of life you have left, let me answer the question you asked earlier more thoroughly. Right at this moment, the biggest "R" I feel is Regret. Regret that maybe the greatest warrior I have ever known, met her end at the hands of a bushwhackin', scrub, alky piece of shit like you. That woman deserved better.

Quotes.Speaker: Budd
Quotes.Quote: That woman deserves her revenge... And we deserve to die. (laughs) But, then again, so does she. So I guess we'll just see...Wont we?

Quotes.Speaker: Budd
Quotes.Quote: Wakey wakey, eggs and bakey.

Movies.Title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
Movies.Actors: Uma Thurman, Lucy Liu, Vivica A. Fox, Daryl Hannah
Movies.Plot: The lead character, called 'The Bride,' was a member of the Deadly Viper Assassination Squad, led by her lover 'Bill.' Upon realizing she was pregnant with Bill's child, 'The Bride' decided to escape her life as a killer. She fled to Texas, met a young man, who, on the day of their wedding rehearsal was gunned down by an angry and jealous Bill (with the assistance of the Deadly Viper Assassination Squad). Four years later, 'The Bride' wakes from a coma, and discovers her baby is gone. She, then, decides to seek revenge upon the five people who destroyed her life and killed her baby. The saga of Kill Bill Volume I begins.

Quotes.Speaker: The Bride
Quotes.Quote: Those of you lucky enough to still have their lives, take them with you! However, leave the limbs you've lost. They belong to me now...except you Sofie! You stay exactly where you are.

Quotes.Speaker: The Bride
Quotes.Quote: This Pasadena homemaker's name is Jeanne Bell. Her husband is Dr. Lawrence Bell. But back when we were acquainted four years ago, her name was Vernita Green. Her code name was Copperhead. Mine, Black Mamba.

Quotes.Speaker: The Bride
Quotes.Quote: We have unfinished business.

Quotes.Speaker: The Bride
Quotes.Quote: I didn't say sell me. I said give me.

Quotes.Speaker: The Bride
Quotes.Quote: Bitch! You can stop right there. Just because I have no wish to murder you before the eyes of your daughter does not mean that parading her around in front of me is gonna inspire sympathy. You and I have unfinished business and not a God damn fucking thing you've done in the subsequent four years including getting knocked up is gonna change that.

Quotes.Speaker: The Bride
Quotes.Quote: No, no, no, no... Get even? Even Steven? I would have to kill you, go up to Nikki's room kill her and wait for your husband the good Doctor Bell to come home and kill him. That would be even, Vernita. That would be about square.

Quotes.Speaker: The Bride
Quotes.Quote: As I said before, I've allowed you to keep your wicked life for two reasons. And the second reason is so you can tell him in person everything that happened here tonight. I want him to witness the extent of my mercy by witnessing your deformed body. I want you to tell him all the information you just told me. I want him to know what I know. I want him to know I want him to know. And I want them all to know they'll all soon be as dead as O-Ren.

Quotes.Speaker: The Bride
Quotes.Quote: Bitch, you don't have a future.

Quotes.Speaker: The Bride
Quotes.Quote: It was not my intention to do this in front of you. For that I'm sorry. But you can take my word for it, your mother had it comin'. When you grow up, if you still feel raw about it, I'll be waiting.

Quotes.Speaker: Elle Driver
Quotes.Quote: I might never have liked you. Point of fact, I despise you. But that doesn't suggest I don't respect you. Dying in our sleep is a luxury our kind is rarely afforded. My gift to you.

Quotes.Speaker: Elle Driver
Quotes.Quote: Thought that was pretty fuckin' funny didn't you? Word of advice, shithead - don't you ever wake up.

Quotes.Speaker: Vernita Green
Quotes.Quote: So I suppose it's a little late for apologies, huh?

Quotes.Speaker: Vernita Green
Quotes.Quote: Look bitch... I need to know if you're going to start any more shit around my baby girl.

Quotes.Speaker: Vernita Green
Quotes.Quote: Look, I know I fucked you over. I fucked you over bad, I wished to God I hadn't but I did. You have every right to wanna get even.

Quotes.Speaker: O-Ren Ishii
Quotes.Quote: As your leader, I encourage you from time to time, and always in a respectful manner, to question my logic. If you're unconvinced that a particular plan of action I've decided is the wisest, tell me so, but allow me to convince you and I promise you right here and now, no subject will ever be taboo. Except, of course, the subject that was just under discussion. The price you pay for bringing up either my Chinese or American heritage as a negative is... I collect your fucking head. Just like this fucker here. Now, if any of you sons of bitches got anything else to say, now's the fucking time!

Quotes.Speaker: O-Ren Ishii
Quotes.Quote: You didn't think it was gonna be that easy, did you?

Quotes.Speaker: O-Ren Ishii
Quotes.Quote: The price you pay for bringing up either my Chinese or my American heritage as a negative is, I collect your fucking head. Just like this fucker here. Now if any of you sons of bitches got anything else to say, NOW'S THE FUCKING TIME! ...I didn't think so.

Quotes.Speaker: O-Ren Ishii
Quotes.Quote: Silly Caucasian girl likes to play with samurai swords. You may not be able to fight like a samurai, but you can at least die like a samurai.

Quotes.Speaker: Budd
Quotes.Quote: That woman deserves her revenge...and we deserve to die.

Quotes.Speaker: Hattori Hanzo
Quotes.Quote: Funny, you like samurai swords... I like baseball.

Quotes.Speaker: Hattori Hanzo
Quotes.Quote: You must have big rats if you need Hattori Hanzo's steel.

Quotes.Speaker: Hattori Hanzo
Quotes.Quote: I am finished doing what I swore an oath to God 28 years ago to never do again. I've created, "something that kills people." And in that purpose, I was a success. I've done this because, philosophically, I am sympathetic to your aim. I can tell you with no ego, this is my finest sword. If on your journey, you should encounter God, God will be cut.

Movies.Title: Jackie Brown
Movies.Plot: The middle-aged stewardess Jackie Brown smuggles money from Mexico to Los Angeles for the arms dealer Ordell Robbie. When she gets caught by the agents Ray Nicolet and Mark Dargus with ten thousand dollars and cocaine in her purse, they propose a deal to her to help them to arrest Ordell in exchange of her freedom. Meanwhile Ordell asks the 56-year-old Max Cherry, who runs a bail bond business, to release Jackie Brown with the intention of eliminating her. Jackie suspects of Ordell's intention and plots a complicated confidence game with Max to steal half a million dollars from Ordell.

Quotes.Speaker: Ordell Robbie
Quotes.Quote: You can't trust Melanie, but you can trust Melanie to be Melanie.

Quotes.Speaker: Ordell Robbie
Quotes.Quote: My money's in that office, right? If she start giving me some bullshit about it ain't there, and we got to go someplace else and get it, I'm gonna shoot you in the head, then and there. Then I'm gonna shoot that bitch in the kneecaps, find out where my goddamn money is. She gonna tell me too. Hey, look at me when I'm talking to you, motherfucker. You listen: we go in there, and that nigga Winston or anybody else is in there, you the first motherfucker to get shot. You understand?

Quotes.Speaker: Ordell Robbie
Quotes.Quote: What the fuck happened to you, man? Shit, your ass used to be beautiful!

Quotes.Speaker: Ordell Robbie
Quotes.Quote: Fuck's wrong with you, knockin' on the door like the goddamned police? You lookin' to get shot?

Quotes.Speaker: Ordell Robbie
Quotes.Quote: You keep fuckin' with me, you the one gonna be asleep. Forever.

Quotes.Speaker: Ordell Robbie
Quotes.Quote: Now that, my friend, is a clear-cut case of him or me. And you best believe it ain't gonna be me.

Quotes.Speaker: Ordell Robbie
Quotes.Quote: Let me give you the reason, motherfucker! The reason is your ass ain't worth a shit no more!

Quotes.Speaker: Ordell Robbie
Quotes.Quote: Goddamn girl, you gettin' high already? It's just 2 o'clock!

Quotes.Speaker: Ordell Robbie
Quotes.Quote: You know you smoke too much of that shit, that shit gonna rob you of your own ambition.

Quotes.Speaker: Ordell Robbie
Quotes.Quote: Oh, ya'll a couple Cheech and Chongs, huh?

Quotes.Speaker: Ordell Robbie
Quotes.Quote: My ass may be dumb, but I ain't no dumbass.

Quotes.Speaker: Jackie Brown
Quotes.Quote: Shut your raggedy ass up and sit the fuck down!

Quotes.Speaker: Jackie Brown
Quotes.Quote: Pam is the true diva! She gets better with age just like a fine wine!

Quotes.Speaker: Max Cherry
Quotes.Quote: I'll bet, besides maybe an afro, you look exactly how you did at 29.

Quotes.Speaker: Max Cherry
Quotes.Quote: Half a million dollars will always be missed.

Quotes.Speaker: Max Cherry
Quotes.Quote: Half a million dollars will always be missed.

Quotes.Speaker: Beaumont Livingston
Quotes.Quote: Man, you must be out of your fuckin' mind if you think I'm gonna get in this dirty-ass trunk.

Quotes.Speaker: Beaumont Livingston
Quotes.Quote: I ain't ridin' in no trunk for no minute, man.

Movies.Title: Pulp Fiction
Movies.Plot: Jules Winnfield (Samuel L. Jackson) and Vincent Vega (John Travolta) are two hit men who are out to retrieve a suitcase stolen from their employer, mob boss Marsellus Wallace (Ving Rhames). Wallace has also asked Vincent to take his wife Mia (Uma Thurman) out a few days later when Wallace himself will be out of town. Butch Coolidge (Bruce Willis) is an aging boxer who is paid by Wallace to lose his fight. The lives of these seemingly unrelated people are woven together comprising of a series of funny, bizarre and uncalled-for incidents.

Quotes.Speaker: Mia Wallace
Quotes.Quote: That's when you know you've found somebody special. When you can just shut the fuck up for a minute and comfortably enjoy the silence.

Quotes.Speaker: Mia Wallace
Quotes.Quote: Three tomatoes are walking down the street- a poppa tomato, a momma tomato, and a little baby tomato. Baby tomato starts lagging behind. Poppa tomato gets angry, goes over to the baby tomato, and smooshes him... and says, Catch up.

Quotes.Speaker: Mia Wallace
Quotes.Quote: I do believe Marsellus Wallace, my husband, your boss, told you to take ME out and do WHATEVER I WANTED. Now I wanna dance, I wanna win. I want that trophy, so dance good.

Quotes.Speaker: Mia Wallace
Quotes.Quote: I said God Damn! God Damn...

Quotes.Speaker: Jules Winnfield
Quotes.Quote: You, flock of seagulls, you know why we're here? Why don't you tell my man Vincent where you got the shit hid at?

Quotes.Speaker: Jules Winnfield
Quotes.Quote: I'm sorry, did I break your concentration? I didn't mean to do that. Please, continue, you were saying something about best intentions. What's the matter? Oh, you were finished! Well, allow me to retort. What does Marsellus Wallace look like?

Quotes.Speaker: Jules Winnfield
Quotes.Quote: "What" ain't no country I've ever heard of. They speak English in What?

Quotes.Speaker: Jules Winnfield
Quotes.Quote: English, motherfucker, do you speak it?

Quotes.Speaker: Jules Winnfield
Quotes.Quote: Say 'what' again. Say 'what' again, I dare you, I double dare you motherfucker, say what one more Goddamn time!

Quotes.Speaker: Jules Winnfield
Quotes.Quote: Does he look like a bitch?

Quotes.Speaker: Jules Winnfield
Quotes.Quote: Then why you tryin' to fuck him like a bitch, Brett?

Quotes.Speaker: Jules Winnfield
Quotes.Quote: But Marcellus Wallace don't like to be fucked by anybody except Mrs. Wallace.

Quotes.Speaker: Jules Winnfield
Quotes.Quote: If my answers frighten you then you should cease asking scary questions.

Quotes.Speaker: Jules Winnfield
Quotes.Quote: There's a passage I got memorized. Ezekiel 25:17. "The path of the righteous man is beset on all sides by the inequities of the selfish and the tyranny of evil men. Blessed is he who, in the name of charity and good will, shepherds the weak through the valley of the darkness, for he is truly his brother's keeper and the finder of lost children. And I will strike down upon thee with great vengeance and furious anger those who attempt to poison and destroy My brothers. And you will know I am the Lord when I lay My vengeance upon you."

Quotes.Speaker: Jules Winnfield
Quotes.Quote: See, now I'm thinking: maybe it means you're the evil man. And I'm the righteous man. And Mr. 9mm here... he's the shepherd protecting my righteous ass in the valley of darkness. Or it could mean you're the righteous man and I'm the shepherd and it's the world that's evil and selfish. And I'd like that. But that shit ain't the truth. The truth is you're the weak. And I'm the tyranny of evil men. But I'm tryin', Ringo. I'm tryin' real hard to be the shepherd.

Quotes.Speaker: Jules Winnfield
Quotes.Quote: Hey, sewer rat may taste like pumpkin pie, but I'd never know 'cause I wouldn't eat the filthy motherfucker. Pigs sleep and root in shit. That's a filthy animal. I ain't eat nothin' that ain't got sense enough to disregard its own feces.

Quotes.Speaker: Jules Winnfield
Quotes.Quote: I used the same fuckin' soap you did and when I got finished, the towel didn't look like no goddamn Maxi-Pad!

Quotes.Speaker: Jules Winnfield
Quotes.Quote: Well, I'm a mushroom-cloud-layin' motherfucker, motherfucker! Every time my fingers touch brain, I'm Superfly T.N.T., I'm the Guns of the Navarone! IN FACT, WHAT THE FUCK AM I DOIN' IN THE BACK? YOU'RE THE MOTHERFUCKER WHO SHOULD BE ON BRAIN DETAIL! We're fuckin' switchin'!

Quotes.Speaker: Jules Winnfield
Quotes.Quote: It's the one that says Bad Motherfucker.

Quotes.Speaker: Jules Winnfield
Quotes.Quote: Well believe it now, motherfucker! We gotta get this car off the road! You know cops tend to notice shit like you're driving a car drenched in fucking blood.

Quotes.Speaker: Jules Winnfield
Quotes.Quote: Bitch, be cool!

Quotes.Speaker: Jules Winnfield
Quotes.Quote: Hamburgers! The cornerstone of any nutritious breakfast.

Quotes.Speaker: Jules Winnfield
Quotes.Quote: Mmm-mmmm. That is a tasty burger.

Quotes.Speaker: Jules Winnfield
Quotes.Quote: Don't do that! Don't you fucking do that! Don't blow this shit off! What just happened was a fucking miracle!

Quotes.Speaker: Jules Winnfield
Quotes.Quote: I hate to shatter your ego, but this is not the first time I've had a gun pointed at me.

Quotes.Speaker: Vincent Vega
Quotes.Quote: They call it a Royale with cheese.

Quotes.Speaker: Vincent Vega
Quotes.Quote: Now, if you'll excuse me, I'm going to go home and have a heart attack.

Quotes.Speaker: Vincent Vega
Quotes.Quote: Oh man, I shot Marvin in the face.

Quotes.Speaker: Vincent Vega
Quotes.Quote: We should have fuckin' shotguns.

Quotes.Speaker: Vincent Vega
Quotes.Quote: I-I gotta stab her three times?

Quotes.Speaker: Vincent Vega
Quotes.Quote: Do you wanna continue this theological discussion in the car, or at the jailhouse with the cops?

Quotes.Speaker: Vincent Vega
Quotes.Quote: Why the fuck didn't you tell us somebody was in the bathroom? Slipped your mind? Did you forget that somebody was in there with a goddamn hand cannon?

Quotes.Speaker: Butch Coolidge
Quotes.Quote: Zed's dead, baby. Zed's dead.

Quotes.Speaker: Butch Coolidge
Quotes.Quote: I'm American, honey. Our names don't mean shit.

Quotes.Speaker: The Wolf
Quotes.Quote: Well, let's not start sucking each other's dicks quite yet.

Quotes.Speaker: The Wolf
Quotes.Quote: Get it straight buster - I'm not here to say please, I'm here to tell you what to do and if self-preservation is an instinct you possess you'd better fucking do it and do it quick. I'm here to help - if my help's not appreciated then lotsa luck, gentlemen.

Quotes.Speaker: The Wolf
Quotes.Quote: Just because you are a character doesn't mean that you have character.

Quotes.Speaker: The Wolf
Quotes.Quote: Well, now I'm sure you've all been to county.

Quotes.Speaker: The Wolf
Quotes.Quote: I'm Winston Wolfe. I solve problems.

Quotes.Speaker: Marsellus Wallace
Quotes.Quote: The night of the fight, you may feel a slight sting. That's pride fucking with you. Fuck pride. Pride only hurts, it never helps.

Quotes.Speaker: Marsellus Wallace
Quotes.Quote: Yeah, we cool. Two things. Don't tell nobody about this. This shit is between me, you, and Mr. Soon-To-Be-Living-The-Rest-of-His-Short-Ass-Life-In-Agonizing-Pain Rapist here. It ain't nobody else's business. Two: you leave town tonight, right now. And when you're gone, you stay gone, or you be gone. You lost all your L.A. privileges. Deal?

Quotes.Speaker: Marsellus Wallace
Quotes.Quote: You see, this profession is filled to the brim with unrealistic motherfuckers. Motherfuckers who thought their ass would age like wine. If you mean it turns to vinegar, it does. If you mean it gets better with age, it don't.

Quotes.Speaker: Jimmie
Quotes.Quote: I don't need you to tell me how fucking good my coffee is, okay? I'm the one who buys it. I know how good it is. When Bonnie goes shopping she buys SHIT. I buy the gourmet expensive stuff because when I drink it I want to taste it.

Quotes.Speaker: Jimmie
Quotes.Quote: Don’t fucking Jimmie me, Jules!

Quotes.Speaker: Captain Koons
Quotes.Quote: The way your dad looked at it, this watch was your birthright. He'd be damned if any slopes gonna put their greasy yellow hands on his boy's birthright, so he hid it, in the one place he knew he could hide something: his ass. Five long years, he wore this watch up his ass. Then when he died of dysentery, he gave me the watch. I hid this uncomfortable piece of metal up my ass for two years. Then, after seven years, I was sent home to my family. And now, little man, I give the watch to you.

Quotes.Speaker: Fabienne
Quotes.Quote: Ah, I like that. I like tulip. Tulip is much better than mongoloid.

Movies.Title: Reservoir Dogs
Movies.Plot: Six criminals, who are strangers to each other, are hired by a crime boss, Joe Cabot, to carry out a diamond robbery. Right at the outset, they are given false names with the intention that they won't get too close and will concentrate on the job instead. They are completely sure that the robbery is going to be a success. But, when the police show up right at the time and the site of the robbery, panic spreads amongst the group members, and two of them are killed in the subsequent shootout, along with a few policemen and civilians. When the remaining people assemble at the premeditated rendezvous point (a warehouse), they begin to suspect that one of them is an undercover cop.

Quotes.Speaker: Joe Cabot
Quotes.Quote: Because you're a faggot, alright?

Quotes.Speaker: Joe Cabot
Quotes.Quote: No way, no way. Tried it once, it doesn't work. You get four guys all fighting over who's gonna be Mr. Black, but they don't know each other, so nobody wants to back down. No way. I pick.

Quotes.Speaker: Joe Cabot
Quotes.Quote: There's two ways you can go on this job: my way or the highway.

Quotes.Speaker: Joe Cabot
Quotes.Quote: Toby... Who the fuck is Toby? Toby…

Quotes.Speaker: Joe Cabot
Quotes.Quote: You don't need proof when you have instinct!

Quotes.Speaker: Joe Cabot
Quotes.Quote: All right ramblers, let's get rambling!

Quotes.Speaker: Joe Cabot
Quotes.Quote: Only one thing to do in that case: shit in yer pants an' dive in and swim!

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Brown
Quotes.Quote: Yeah, but Mr. Brown, that's a little too close to Mr. Shit.

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Brown
Quotes.Quote: Let me tell you what 'Like a Virgin' is about. It's all about a girl who digs a guy with a big dick. The entire song. It's a metaphor for big dicks.

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Brown
Quotes.Quote: Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa... Time out Green Bay. Tell that fucking bullshit to the tourists.

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Brown
Quotes.Quote: Lemme tell you what 'Like a Virgin' is about. It's all about this cooze who's a regular fuck machine, I'm talking morning, day, night, afternoon, dick, dick, dick, dick, dick, dick, dick, dick, dick.

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Brown
Quotes.Quote: I mean this cat is like Charles Bronson in the 'Great Escape', he's digging tunnels.

Quotes.Speaker: Nice Guy Eddie
Quotes.Quote: I don't even know a fucking Jew who'd have the balls to say that.

Quotes.Speaker: Nice Guy Eddie
Quotes.Quote: Alright, first things fuckin' last!

Quotes.Speaker: Nice Guy Eddie
Quotes.Quote: LARRY, STOP POINTING THAT FUCKIN' GUN AT MY DAD!

Quotes.Speaker: Nice Guy Eddie
Quotes.Quote: So, Mr. Orange, you're tellin' me this very good friend of mine, who did four years for my father, who in four years never made a deal, no matter what they dangled in front of him, you're telling me that now, that now this man is free, and we're making good on our commitment to him, he's just gonna decide, out of the fucking blue, to rip us off? Why don't you tell me what really happened?

Quotes.Speaker: Nice Guy Eddie
Quotes.Quote: If you fucking beat this prick long enough, he'll tell you he started the goddamn Chicago fire, now that don't necessarily make it fucking so!

Quotes.Speaker: Nice Guy Eddie
Quotes.Quote: Nobody did! You assholes turn the jewelry store into a wild west show, and you wonder why the cops show up?

Quotes.Speaker: Nice Guy Eddie
Quotes.Quote: How would you feel if every time you had to take a piss you had to do a fuckin' hand stand?

Quotes.Speaker: Nice Guy Eddie
Quotes.Quote: Do I sound like I'm joking? He's fuckin' driving around with a cop in his trunk!

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Pink
Quotes.Quote: I don't tip because society says I have to. All right, if someone deserves a tip, if they really put forth an effort, I'll give them something a little something extra. But this tipping automatically, it's for the birds. As far as I'm concerned, they're just doing their job.

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Pink
Quotes.Quote: I don't tip because society says I have to. All right, if someone deserves a tip, if they really put forth an effort, I'll give them something a little something extra. But this tipping automatically, it's for the birds. As far as I'm concerned, they're just doing their job.

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Pink
Quotes.Quote: Somebody's stickin' a red hot poker up our asses and I wanna know who's name's on the handle.

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Pink
Quotes.Quote: I don't wanna kill anybody. But if I gotta get out that door, and you're standing in my way, one way or the other, you're gettin' outta my way.

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Pink
Quotes.Quote: Do you even doubt it, man? I don't THINK we got set up, I KNOW we got set up! I mean, really, seriously, where did all those cops come from, huh? One minute they're not there, the next minute they're there? I didn't hear any sirens.

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Pink
Quotes.Quote: In one minute there were seventeen blue boys out there. All loaded for bear, all knowing exactly what the fuck they were doing, and they were all just there!

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Pink
Quotes.Quote: I can say I definitely didn't do it because I know what I did or didn't do. But I cannot definitely say that about anybody else, 'cause I don't definitely know.

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Pink
Quotes.Quote: Fuck you, White! I didn't create the situation, I'm just dealin' with it! You're acting like a first year fucking thief- I'm acting like a professional!

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Pink
Quotes.Quote: You, buddy, are stuck in a situation YOU created. So, if you wanna throw bad looks somewhere, throw 'em at a mirror!

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Pink
Quotes.Quote: Do you know what this is? It's the world's smallest violin playing just for the waitresses.

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Pink
Quotes.Quote: Come on, guys! Nobody wants this! We're supposed to be fucking professionals!

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Pink
Quotes.Quote: I don't believe this shit. Both of you guys got ten years on me and I'm the only one acting like a professional.

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Pink
Quotes.Quote: Yeah, "Mr. Pink" sounds like "Mr. Pussy". Tell you what, let me be Mr. Purple. That sounds good to me. I'm Mr. Purple.

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Pink
Quotes.Quote: I mean everybody panics, everybody, things get tense, it's human nature to panic, I don't care what you name it you just can't help it.

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Pink
Quotes.Quote: Was that a fucking set up or what?

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Blue
Quotes.Quote: What's special? Take you in the back and suck your dick?

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. White
Quotes.Quote: Shit... You shoot me in a dream, you better wake up and apologize.

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. White
Quotes.Quote: If you shoot this man, you die next. Repeat. If you shoot this man, you die next.

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. White
Quotes.Quote: Toby? Toby Wong. Toby Wong? Toby Wong. Toby Chung? Fucking Charlie Chan. I got Madonna's big dick coming out of my left ear, and Toby the Jap... I don't know what - comin' out of my right.

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. White
Quotes.Quote: Piss on this fucking turd! We're outta here.

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. White
Quotes.Quote: The choice between doing ten years and taking out some stupid motherfucker, ain't no choice at all. But I ain't no madman.

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Blonde
Quotes.Quote: Listen kid, I'm not gonna bullshit you, all right? I don't give a good fuck what you know, or don't know, but I'm gonna torture you anyway, regardless. Not to get information. It's amusing, to me, to torture a cop. You can say anything you want cause I've heard it all before. All you can do is pray for a quick death, which you ain't gonna get.

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Blonde
Quotes.Quote: Are you gonna bark all day little doggie? Or are you gonna bite?

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Blonde
Quotes.Quote: I told 'em not to touch the alarm... but they touched it. If they hadn't done what I told 'em not to do, they'd still be alive.

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Blonde
Quotes.Quote: Torture you? That's a good idea. I like that.

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Blonde
Quotes.Quote: Guess what, I think I'm parked in the red-zone!

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Blonde
Quotes.Quote: You kids shouldn't play so rough. Somebody's gonna start cryin'.

Quotes.Speaker: Mr. Orange
Quotes.Quote: FUCK YOU! FUCK YOU! I'M FUCKIN' DYING HERE! I'M FUCKIN' DYING!
